features: Plug and Play:Computer mouse with an USB＆Type-C 2-in-1 Nano Receiver.Plug the receiver into the your PC and turn on the mouse.To use the receiver's Type-C connector, you need to remove the protective cover on the other end of the USB.Faster pairing,Stable connection,No delay. With 3 adjustable DPI levels (1600-1200-800),By clicking the DPI adjustment button, you can freely choose your cursor speed.

Unique look ＆ Metal bottom : Wireless Mouse have a Special design appearance, Including elements of aliens and sports cars. Its surface is very smooth thanks to the plating process. It is more friendly to the skin, and its bottom is made of aluminum alloy, which makes the mice more portable and durable.

Rechargeable ＆ silent click : This rechargeable mouse has a high quality built-in battery and an intelligent power saving system that makes it standby for a long time. Silent design reduces clicking sound by 90%,Does not disturb others while in use.

Ergonomic Comfortable Design:Ergonomic mouse and special shape,No tired hand after long-term work and study.Can be used in offices, schools, dormitories, etc.This unique cordless mice is suitable as a gift.

Wide Compatibility: Wireless laptop mouse with USB＆Type-C receiver, Can be used all devices with USB port and Tepy-c port, Fits Notebook, Chromebook,Macbook,iPad, iPad Pro, MacBook pro, MacBook Air, PC, Laptop, Computer,tablet and more. Well compatible with Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10, 11, Mac OS X 10.4, PS4, PS5, Xbox, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouse works perfectly. No special buttons, just a good, rechargeable mouse that looks really cool
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this mouse. In my house, there is a game/bedroom/shop/plant nursery, with a round table, a 55" TCL smart TV is over one side of the table. The TV connected to wifi a computer and an X Box. The the mouse on that table gets passed around like a Christmas fruitcake. The old one finally quit. This replacement is a real hit. It works perfectly, it is sturdy mostly metal, it is RECHARGEABLE, and looks really cool. I don't know what else I can say. I am really happy with this mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I first received this mouse, I thought it was defective and tried to return it. They sent me a trouble shooting guide and I was able to get it working shortly after. I use this mouse all day for work and then on my personal computer for gaming in the evenings. This unit runs forever on very brief charges (10-20 minutes) and in almost a year of continuous use it has only died once.The unit goes to sleep when idle, you will need to click it to wake it up. Don't turn it upside down or the laser will blast your eyes. The chrome-like finish is starting to wear off in a small spot where my palm rests.All-in-all, it has been a good little mouse and if it failed now, I feel like I got my moneys worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as advertised. Lightweight, very sturdy production, rechargeable, unique design, comfortable in small or medium hands, very customizable,works on all surfaces, and decent frequency distance.The reason why it lost the star (which really is no fault of the manufacturing or the device) is strictly because I have very large hands and it's not as comfortable as it could be if it was just scaled .5 longer.I would still 100% recommend it to anybody who wants a wireless mouse that has a ton of capabilities and can be used easily with desktop to laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A few issues.
reviews.reviewText: Alright this mouse looks really cool, it feels great, it glides great. the issue is that the focus of the laser is about 5 mm below the actual base of the mouse. This causes the mouse to receive random inputs as you lift it up to move it across the mouse pad. It is jarring and makes it un usable in my opinion. There is also no documentation. I have no idea what the button at the top does. maybe pairing? Theres also no LED feedback for battery level as far as i know. This is an awesome shell around terrible hardware. i may actually try to tear the guts out of this and replace it with a cheap logitec on the inside. Shame though, no one should have to do this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not even work five minutes
reviews.reviewText: it came really quickly, looks great, plugged it in to charge, the light went off five minutes later, so I assumed it was charged up. Plugged in the usb reciever, turned on the mouse. The red light blinked once, but went off. So It never came on. Tried turning it off and on several times. Turn it on it blinks red once, but goes right back off. So I plugged it back in, thinking maybe it just did not charge. Plugged it in, the light came on and I left it plugged in a couple hours. The charging light was off so I checked it again. Nothing. So no, I am not satisfied with the product, no matter how cool it looks or feels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is fast and smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For everything except gaming.
reviews.reviewText: I titled this 'For everything except gaming'. First, I'm not a gamer nor do I ever want to be. Sadly, my son is. He said he would not use this mouse for gaming because of the click rate and resolution of the optic. He does crazy drag click and other things I don't know what is. His fancy mouse cost over $100. OK,,,,I have 2 of these and use one on my work computer and one on my personal computer I video edit on. This is comfortable in the hand. It is wireless. It goes to sleep mode in about 5 minutes of no use which preserves the battery life. It is rechargeable via a USB-C. It can be used while charging if your cord is long enough. Let's talk about battery life... The one I use on my work computer I use all day every day. I charge it once a week. The one on my personal computer gets used in evenings only and some evenings not at all. It needs charged 2 times a week. Well way less use. I'm trying to figure that out. Either way. There are several light modes. If you move the mouse and it doesn't light up. Its asleep. Just click a button and there you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Fun Design, Poor Quality
reviews.reviewText: The design of the mouse was appealing and it performed moderately well for the most part. However, I encountered some issues during use. Specifically, the placement of the power switch on the underside made it prone to accidental shut-offs when I was sliding the mouse. Additionally, prolonged use led to discomfort in my hand. After about a month of use, the mouse failed to charge, rendering it unusable. Given these issues, I cannot recommend this product for long-term use.
Cuando esta en uso, el puntero del mouse brinca.
No lo recomiendo me duró 1 semana
